channel.title: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor" - I need 2 sham rocks for special mission i can trade these items:

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
item.content:encoded: I could trade with you, if you still want to :)

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
item.content:encoded:
Heeey. This is a damn old thread man :D
And im no n00b anymore.
Got a persocom and 360 smokies for trade

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
item.content:encoded: No, your right, I'll have to remember to check stuff like that out next time. Thanks for the advice.

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
item.content:encoded: no offense but given the date of his post and his current season i doubt he would be interested at all and he's in a immortal realm so there's bound to be someone who can help him out

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
item.content:encoded: Why? How can I make it more fair?

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
item.content:encoded: I'll never know unless I ask, and a bad deal for me or for him?

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
item.content:encoded: i doubt he still needs this and that isn't a very good deal

item.title: Re: I need 2 sham rocks and a chakra armor
